title: 04/26/21: JAVA update for Horarius users
content: Due to the new Java update, you may not be able to open Horarius, or download documents from Horarius.In order to remedy this problem, please do the following:Access to Java Control Panel - Windows / IOSGo to the Security tab and choose the High optionIn this subsection, click Edit Site List, and copy/paste the following two sites:A first line:https://www.horarius.net/A second line:https://www.emprez.net/Save your preferences, exit the Java control panel and restart Horarius. The problem should be gone.Java version 291 will make it impossible for you to download reports or other PDF files offered by Horarius.To overcome this problem, you have two options:Go through Emprez: www.emprez.net with your Horarius accessesCreate a shortcut on your desktop where the files will be loaded temporarily C:\Users\Utilisateur\AppData\Local\Temp(The temporary link, "user" is the default. If you are connecting from a user / mdp to your windows session, it is likely that User should be changed to your Windows session name)One of the main reasons motivating the development of the Emprez version of our service was the problems with updating Java by the Oracle developer. If you need training on how it works, make an appointment with one of our agents. We will be happy to assist you in the free transition to this new, more efficient version of your favourite service for managing your schedules.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
